name: Candle State Change Experiment - ContentsDa Science Experiment
summary:
place the empty beaker on the trivet
place a candle in it
light the alcohol lamp
melt the candle
the candle has melted and become liquid
weigh the candle in its liquid state
the candle can be hardened quickly
the candle has solidified and is now a solid. Weigh it.

<Results
You can see that the mass of the candle when it was melted and when it cooled again, the mass did not change, but the volume did.
When a substance changes state! Mass remains unchanged, volume...
